Package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services

Class MenuServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.MenuServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuService
@Service public class MenuServiceImpl extends Object implements MenuService
Implementation of MenuRepository and MenuService which provides methods for the controller.

    • updateAll

      Updates the menu entity in the database by overwriting the menu entity with the same menuid.
      Specified by:
      updateAll in interface MenuService
      Parameters:
      menu - the menu entity that will overwrite the old menu entity.
      Returns:
      the new menu entity in the db.

    • updatePrice

      public Menu updatePrice(String menuid, float updatedPrice)
      Finds a menu entity by its menuid and changes its price to match updatedPrice, returns null if the ID is not valid.
      Specified by:
      updatePrice in interface MenuService
      Parameters:
      menuid - The menuId of the menu entity to change the price of.
      updatedPrice - The updatedPrice that'll overwrite the previous price.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db with the new updated price.

    • getById

      public Optional<Menu> getById(String menuid)
      Returns a specific menu entity associated with the menuid given, or an empty Optional if no such order with that ID exists.
      Specified by:
      getById in interface MenuService
      Parameters:
      menuid - the ID of the menu entity that should be returned.
      Returns:
      An Optional which contains the menu entity that's associated with the given menuId, Optional is empty if the ID was not valid.

    • getNameById

      public String getNameById(String id)
      Returns a specific menu name associated with the menuId given, or an empty Optional if no such order with that ID exists.
      Specified by:
      getNameById in interface MenuService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu entities name that is being searched for.
      Returns:
      A String which contains the menu entities name that's associated with the given ID, Optional is empty if the ID was not valid.
